name: Angry Shapes
description:
New genre of tower defense game here - Angry shapes: Clash of geometry!

Place your turrets without any constraints on the battlefield in order to defeat the infinite flowing shapes!

FEATURES
☆ Temporary turrets ☆
In order to make the gameplay more addictive, every turret is temporary!
☆ Skills(boosters) ☆
Increase the efficacy of a turret for a limited period of time!
☆ Upgrades ☆
Increase the efficacy of a turret by upgrading it!
☆ Achievements ☆
Complete achievements that will earn you rewards!
☆ Secret codes ☆
Share codes with your friends to earn coins!

Ready? Enter the battlefield, where angry shapes are waiting to clash your weapons!

Note: Media access permission required to store&share images
